Summary: Was stargazing, witnessed small orange light grow brighter, changed direction
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside stargazing, when i noticed a small Orange light. I watched it for about 30 seconds before I grabbed my phone and started filming. The object flew at me for about 20 more seconds before turning to my right, its left. It flew that way for a short time before turning back towards me. It flew over the hill behind my house, I then ran to the driveway to get a better angle. It suddenly did a U-turn very quickly and flew down behind the hill. I do have a video, however I tried to upload it once and it kicked me offline so I'm not attaching it this time. Duration of sight, 6-6.5 minutes.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sevierville
There were no other sightings in Sevierville on or around August 18th 2012
